attributes.title: Russian Roulette - #12
attributes.caption: Russian Roulette
attributes.description: Geoff Ramsey, Gavin Free, Griffon Ramsey, Meg Turney and friends Lindsay Hicks and Amy Jackson Lewis get ready for the new year by playing a little Russian Roulette.

attributes.title: The Vegemite Challenge - #13
attributes.caption: The Vegemite Challenge
attributes.description: In February of 2011 in Sydney Australia, Geoff Ramsey challenged Griffon Ramsey to the (illegal in most countries) Vegemite Challenge. Will she persevere If she does, will Geoff still want to be married Special guest Matt Hullum!

attributes.title: Adventures in Driving - #14
attributes.caption: Adventures in Driving
attributes.description: Geoff Ramsey, Gavin Free, and Griffon Ramsey chronicle the bizarre and hilarious day to day events that happen while driving the mean streets of Austin, TX.

attributes.title: Piper Cleaners and Dog Tags - #15
attributes.caption: Piper Cleaners and Dog Tags
attributes.description: Gavin films as Geoff and Griffon perform some anatomical experiments while stretching their limits.

attributes.title: Sandpile - #16
attributes.caption: Sandpile
attributes.description: Geoff and Griffon are not 4 years old, but they do still love diving into a pile of sand.

attributes.title: Whiskey Head - #17
attributes.caption: Whiskey Head
attributes.description: Griffon, Gavin, Dan and Geoff piss off the locals during SXSW.

attributes.title: Scousers - #18
attributes.caption: Scousers
attributes.description: Throughout the years Gavin has taught Geoff a fair amount of British lingo. He once told Geoff that people from Liverpool are called Scousers. Turns out Geoff's memory isn't that great.

attributes.title: Salt and Vinegar Cat - #19
attributes.caption: Salt and Vinegar Cat
attributes.description: Gav gets woken up at 3 in the morning by his cat, Smee, who isn't very stealthy when it comes to stealing salt and vinegar crisps.

attributes.title: Close Shave  - #20
attributes.caption: Close Shave
attributes.description: Personal hygiene is important.

attributes.title: Rain Run - #21
attributes.caption: Rain Run
attributes.description: Gavin experiences his first Texas thunderstorm... among other things. Big things.

attributes.title: Do Dicks Age? - #22
attributes.caption: Do Dicks Age?
attributes.description: Geoff and Gavin often have deep discussions in the car as they drive to bars. Sometimes, however, they need an additional perspective. Griffon drops the dick knowledge on them both.

attributes.title: The Pee Bet (Uncensored) - #23
attributes.caption: The Pee Bet (Uncensored)
attributes.description: In 2009, Gavin Free and Griffon Ramsey made a stupid bet resulting in the loser having to pee his or her pants and let Geoff Ramsey film it for the trio's old Vimeo account. We present it to you now on Youtube, UNCENSORED for the first time ever!

attributes.title: The Hot Chocolate Challenge - #25
attributes.caption: Griffon takes the Hot Chocolate challenge. That's not a real challenge, we made it up.
attributes.description: Griffon takes the Hot Chocolate challenge. That's not a real challenge, we made it up.

attributes.title: Gavin After Dentist - #26
attributes.caption: Gavin gets four teeth pulled out of his face and the power of comprehension pulled out of his brain.
attributes.description: Gavin gets four teeth pulled out of his face and the power of comprehension pulled out of his brain.

attributes.title: Drunken Promises & Tanning Session - #27
attributes.caption: Geoff Ramsey follows through on a drunken promise to Meg Turney by getting a spray tan and doing a photo shoot with her for theCHIVE. Sexy or incredibly awkward? You decide!
attributes.description: Geoff Ramsey follows through on a drunken promise to Meg Turney by getting a spray tan and doing a photo shoot with her for theCHIVE. Sexy or incredibly awkward You decide!

attributes.title: Titanic Tears - #28
attributes.caption: It took Geoff 18 years to finally watch Titanic. It only took 18 minutes for him to start bawling like a baby.
attributes.description: It took Geoff 18 years to finally watch Titanic. It only took 18 minutes for him to start bawling like a baby.

attributes.title: The Impressionist - #29
attributes.caption: After a few bevs, Geoff does his best impression of what happens when you turn on a TV in England.
attributes.description: After a few bevs, Geoff does his best impression of what happens when you turn on a TV in England.

attributes.title: Brains - #30
attributes.caption: ​Warning: This video is about to get gross… unless you’re a zombie, or live in a country where eating brains is completely culturally acceptable (like Ohio).
attributes.description: Warning: This video is about to get gross unless youre a zombie, or live in a country where eating brains is completely culturally acceptable (like Ohio). To celebrate the season finale of their favorite show (iZombie), Geoff, Griffon, Michael and Lindsay cook up some brains of their own, just to see what Liv goes through on a weekly basis. Do brains taste good Did we need hot sauce Watch at your own risk.Editors note: No human brains were consumed in the filming of this video.

attributes.title: Champagne Kisses - #31
attributes.caption: Gavin and Griffon have a bubbly little celebration, Happy Hour style.
attributes.description: Gavin and Griffon have a bubbly little celebration, Happy Hour style.

attributes.title: #Dan the Marinara - #32
attributes.caption: When Dan isn't getting humiliated or injured in a Slow Mo Guys video, Geoff takes up the reins.
attributes.description: When Dan isn't getting humiliated or injured in a Slow Mo Guys video, Geoff takes up the reins.
